content: rounds mark the first stitch in each round and move up with each completed round - the toe strap is made separately and sewn to sole - the heel strap is worked differently for the left and right shoes method 0-3 months sole make four soles two in each colour round 1 chain 11 3sc into 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 8 3sc in last st turn your work slightly and single_crochet 8 along the opposite side of the chains 22 st round 2 2sc in each of the next 3 stitches ensuring you mark the first st single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet 2dc in each of the next 5 st increasing double_crochet half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 3 30 st you will work to the stitch just before the marker round 3 *single_crochet 2sc in next st* three times single_crochet 9 *2sc in next st single_crochet in next* four times single_crochet 7 37 st round 4 single_crochet 2 work 2sc in next st single_crochet 3 work 2sc in next st single_crochet 13 2sc in next st single_crochet 5 2sc in next st single_crochet 10 end off 41 st sewing the sole together select two contrasting colours and place wrong sides together at this point you will need to decide what colour the main part of the sandal will be strap and heel i have selected the darker pink for my sandals so have placed the sole on the bottom with the lighter pink on the top ensure you match the single crochets to each other insert your hook into one of the single_crochet stitches on the heel of the sole ensure you work through both st itches the light pink on top and dark pink on the bottom attach yarn around the hook same colour as the base sole and draw up a loop 3 work a slip_stitch into each single_crochet both front and back soles you will end up with 40 sl st to make the last stitch cut a length of yarn approx 5 and attach a yarn needle insert the needle through the first slip_stitch and pull through then insert the needle through the middle of the two slip_stitch strands in the previous st push through the sole and weave into the base to hide the end 4 making the strap approx 2 5 make two these straps will be attached to the top of the sandal over the toes you will need to make two of these straps if your strap is too long decrease the chains by 2 so you have fewer stars if your strap is too short increase the chains in multiples of 2 two chains = 1 star star stitch tutorial step 1 chain 18 step 2 insert hook into 2nd chain from step 3 insert hook into the next four hook and draw up a loop chains drawing up a loop in each you will have 6 loops on your hook step 4 yarn over and draw through all step 5
